snippet: Political figures in Florida, supporters and opponents alike, recall Mr. Rubio’s quick ascent in the Legislature, in which he became House speaker from 2006 to 2008.
abstract: Republican presidential contender Sen Marco Rubio rose to power in Florida, becoming first Cuban-American to be state's speaker of the House, through unwavering drive that is now bolstering his campaign for White House; 44-year-old is seen by many as young man in a hurry and master of inside game of politics.
lead_paragraph: Political figures in Florida, supporters and opponents alike, recall Mr. Rubio’s quick ascent in the Legislature, in which he became House speaker from 2006 to 2008.

headline.print_headline: Ambition and Relentlessness Fueled Rubio’s Rise in Tallahassee
headline.main: Marco Rubio’s Ambition, and Sharp Elbows, Fueled His Rise in Tallahassee
